mapper.select:
SELECT B.FREEBOARD_NO, B.TITLE, M.UNO, B.CONTENT, B.FILE_ORIGINAL, B.FILE_RENAMED, B.COUNT, B.POST_DATE, B.BOARD_TYPE FROM COMM_FREEBOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.UNO = M.UNO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y'
AND M.U_NAME LIKE '%'||#{writerKeyword}||'%'
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{titleKeyword}||'%'
AND B.CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{contentKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY B.NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMM_FREEBOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.UNO = M.UNO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y'
AND M.U_NAME LIKE '%'||#{writerKeyword}||'%'
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{titleKeyword}||'%'
AND B.CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{contentKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY B.NO DESC

SELECT B.FREEBOARD_NO, B.TITLE, M.UNO, B.CONTENT, B.FILE_ORIGINAL, B.FILE_RENAMED, B.COUNT, B.POST_DATE, B.BOARD_TYPE, R.COMMENT_NO AS R_COMMENT_NO, R.FREEBOARD_NO AS R_FREEBOARD_NO, R.CONTENT AS R_CONTENT, M2.UNO AS R_UNO, R.POST_DATE AS R_POST_DATE, R.STATUS AS R_STATUS, FROM COMM_FREEBOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.UNO = M.UNO) LEFT OUTER JOIN FREEBOARD_COMMENT R ON(B.FREEBOARD_NO = R.BOARD_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M2 ON(R.UNO = M2.UNO) WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND B.FREEBOARD_NO=#{freeBoardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMM_FREEBOARD ( FREEBOARD_NO, UNO, TITLE, CONTENT, FILE_ORIGINAL, FILE_RENAMED, COUNT, POST_DATE, STATUS, BOARD_TYPE, ) VALUES ( SEQ_FREENO.NEXTVAL, #{uNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{fileOriginal}, #{fileRenamed}, 1, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
INSERT INTO FREEBOARD_COMMENT VALUES(SEQ_FREE_COMMENT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{freeboardNo}, #{uNo}, #{content}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT)
mapper.update:
UPDATE COMM_FREEBOARD SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content},
ORIGINAL_FILENAME=#{originalFileName},
RENAMED_FILENAME=#{renamedFileName},
WHERE FREEBOARD_NO=#{freeBoardNo}
UPDATE COMM_FREEBOARD SET COUNT=#{count} WHERE FREEBOARD_NO=#{freeBoardNo}
UPDATE COMM_FREEBOARD SET STATUS='N' WHERE FREEBOARD_NO=#{freeBoardNo}
mapper.delete: UPDATE FREEBOARD_COMMENT SET STATUS='N' WHERE COMMENT_NO=#{commentNo}
